solution.text:
A flower which contains both male and female reproductive parts is a bisexual flower
A flower which contains only the male reproductive part is a unisexual flower
A flower which contains only the female reproductive part is a unisexual flower
One of the above options is correct

content.text: Which of the following is a bisexual flower?

incorrect.text: A flower which contains only stamen
A flower which contains only pistil

correct.text: A flower which contains stamen and pistil
